name: Pippa Middleton
politicalViews: Pippa is largely non-political, though she does participate in a few charities and hangs out with Europe's elite.
author: Tom Kershaw

content.text: Pippa Middleton, real name Philippa, was born in Reading, Berkshire, England and grew up around Berkshire.

content.sourceTitle: Kate Middleton's Secret Confirmation: How Religious Is The Future Princess
content.text: Not nearly as much is known about Pippa as is known about her princess sister, Kate Middleton. But we do know that Kate was baptized into the Anglican Church as a baby,
so it's safe to assume that Pippa probably was as well.

content.sourceTitle: Kate Middleton's Secret Confirmation: How Religious Is The Future Princess
content.text: All in all, the Middletons don't seem like the most religious family. The parents–and thus the children–were not regular church-goers and Kate didn't participate, as many British teenagers do, in a ceremony affirming her Anglican faith.

content.sourceTitle: Party girls like Pippa Middleton need to give terminal bores a miss
content.text: If we were to designate a sort of religious worldview to Pippa ourselves, it could easily be some sort of hedonism. Her party-girl exploits are well-known.

content.sourceTitle: Pippa Middleton's Party Book Falls Flat
content.text: And she even wrote and released a book about how to plan a party–although sales were dismal.
So, we'll just go ahead and mark her down for the non-religious Anglican category, where she joins the majority of her fellow Brits.

content.sourceTitle: Should Pippa Middleton be created a Princess and Beatrice and Eugenie be demoted?
content.text: Good news! Pippa is not a royal, though she has been occasionally dubbed "Her Royal Hotness,"
so she is allowed a political position in British life. She can vote or run for office or take a stand on an issue or opine in newspapers–whatever!

content.sourceTitle: Pippa Middleton Gun Scandal – Could Royal Sis Face Arrest?
content.text: She does seem to regularly get herself wrapped up in some situation involving guns. For a brief moment, it looked like she might be spending a couple of years in a French prison when the driver of a car she was in waved a gun at Parisian paparazzi.

content.sourceTitle: Duchess of Cambridge's younger sister Pippa Middleton, a boar hunt and 2 Belgian bachelors
content.text: And she has been known to go hunting with billionaires.
The whole billionaire situation might, in a sense, define her political views–basically just elitist hobnobbing with Europe's upper-crust.

content.sourceTitle: Pippa Middleton completes 56-mile marathon for charity.
content.text: She does do her bit for charity, skiing for primary school kids' breakfasts

content.sourceTitle: Pippa Middleton Reveals Olympic Charity Work
content.text: or working with Olympians children's foundations.
But that's about all we can squeeze from this turnip, she's a fun-loving party girl reveling in her fame. Perhaps there will be a more serious Pippa in the future.
